actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 70.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration, from March 1, 1985, through February 28, 1986, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide for the training of its professional staff.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Rules and Administration.
